info.title: USA Today Breaking News
info.description: The USA TODAY Breaking News API provides a method for developers to retrieve our breaking news content. Data is presented in an RSS format, with headline, summary text and URLs for the web and mobile sites.

get.description: The USA TODAY Breaking News API provides a method for developers to retrieve our breaking news content. Data is presented in an RSS format, with headline, summary text and URLs for the web and mobile sites.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query
